column1: “May the Force be with you.” -Star Wars 1977
“Hope. It is the only thing stronger than fear. A little hope is effective. A lot of hope is dangerous.” -The Hunger
“There's no place like home.” -The Wizard of Oz 1939
“Dobby has heard of your greatness sir but of your goodness Dobby never knew.” —Dobby
“Carpe diem. Seize the day boys. Make your lives extraordinary.” -Dead Poets Society 1989
“Elementary my dear Watson.” -The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes 1939
“Some walks you have to take alone.” -The Hunger Games
“If you want to know what a man’s like take a good look at how he treats his inferiors not his equals.” —Sirius Black
“My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.” -Forrest Gump 1994
“My precious.” -The Lord of the Rings: Two Towers 2002
“There's no crying in baseball!” -A League of Their Own 1992
